name: OR_LOG_COMMENTS
description: The OR_LOG_COMMENTS table contains OR management system log comments.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log referred to by the log comments

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the case notes in the surgical log.

columns.name: CASE_NOTES
columns.description: The free text general notes about the surgery in the surgical log.
